title: BRIEF-Orocobre Updates On Advantage Lithium Corp's Pre-Feasibility Study On Cauchari Lithium Project
text:
BRIEF-Orocobre Updates On Advantage Lithium Corp's Pre-Feasibility Study On Cauchari Lithium Project

Commodities 36 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 20:56)

BRIEF-Orocobre Updates On Advantage Lithium Corp's Pre-Feasibility Study On Cauchari Lithium Project Oct 23 (Reuters) - Orocobre Ltd : * ADVANTAGE LITHIUM RELEASED A SUMMARY OF PRE-FEASIBILITY STUDY IN ACCORDANCE WITH CANADIAN STANDARDS ON CAUCHARI LITHIUM PROJECT TO TSXV * CO WILL NOT BE RELEASING THIS SUMMARY AS IT DOES NOT PROVIDE SUFFICIENT DETAIL TO COMPLY WITH GUIDANCE PROVIDED BY ASX AND ASIC

BRIEF-Orocobre Updates On Advantage Lithium Corp's Pre-Feasibility Study On Cauchari Lithium Project
